intro: Osbeckia kleinii, commonly known as the Klein's willow-herb, is a flowering plant native to South America, particularly found in Argentina and Chile. Osbeckia kleinii is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its hardiness and ability to stabilize soil in degraded areas.
